title: (x) Retro 1970/1980s geometric sans w/slanted caps - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Lex}
content:
Hi there, I’m new, so if I screw this up I apologize.

I’m looking for a font that’s been used a little obscurely. It’s like a sans or slab serif with slanted Ms Ws As Ys.

It’s a very retro 1970s and 1980s font. It was used in the title of the

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/06/Moonlighting.jpg/200...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090728/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/06/Moonlighting.jpg/200px-Moonlighting.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/06/Moonlighting.jpg/200px-Moonlighting.jpg")

moonlighting TV series and I’ve seen a similar version of it as the header for [http://www.candycollective.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090728/http:/www.candycollective.com/index.html "http://www.candycollective.com/index.html")

candy collective’s magazine.

comments.content:
Avant Garde with Alternates. It’s not that obscure - we get it a lot around here.

- Lex

[Here’s a link.](http://web.archive.org/web/20091119090728/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=avant+garde&x=0&y=0)

- Lex

P.S. I just noticed I used it for my avatar \<—
Thanks Lex. I was thinking it was an Avant Garde font, but I didn’t know anything about the alternates. I’ve noticed it’s been really around a lot now. Logoonline.com is using it in some ads now.
